ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

AE4018K3 6.6dBi UHF H/Duty Elevated Feed , SS Spring Antenna - GME

Rugged, high-performance Antennas to suit Australia's harsh conditions.
GMEs most heavy duty elevated feed style UHF antenna. When extreme conditions are a constant, the AE4018K3 is the best option. It introduces GMEs latest elevated feed the ABL017, made with delrin plastics and the extra heavy duty AS003 parallel style electro polished SS (Stainless Steel) spring.The whip is made from durable fibreglass with software controlled precision winding around a braided copper element, black heat shrink and chrome plated ferrule. Providing 6.6dBi gain, this antenna assembly is a fantastic all round antenna for use where extreme heavy use is expected - alternatively, the styling is simply preferred!

  • Ground independent

web_info_text: Two of GME most popular antennas in a convenient all-in-one package!
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

Rugged, high-performance Antennas to suit Australia's harsh conditions


The All Terrain UHF Antenna twin pack is a new offering from GME, combining two of our most popular heavy-duty antenna options - the AE4705B and AW4704B, in a convenient all-in-one package.


Included in the AE4705BTP is the AE4705B, a 6.6dBi gain antenna, with a rugged, heavy-duty spring base - ideal for communication across flat, open terrain. For enhanced performance in built-up areas or mountainous terrain, simply unscrew the AE4705 antenna whip and replace with the 2.1dBi gain AW4704 whip.


Offering the ultimate in versatility and convenience, the All Terrain Pack is the perfect solution for 4WD enthusiasts who demand rugged, high-quality accessories.

{tab Features}

  • Two antenna whip options to suit a variety of environments
  • Black Radome fibreglass construction
  • Ground independent
  • Heavy duty spring base

{tab Specifications}

Frequency Band: 477 MhZ
Gain (dBi): 6.6 / 2.1
Ground Dependance: Ground independent
Construction Type: Black fibreglass radome with electro polished ferrule (ABL004) and heavy duty stainless steel barrel spring (AS004/B)
Height/Length: 1200mm / 460mm
Cable and Connector: 4.5m of low loss coaxial cable. Thread 1/2” BSW

{tab In the Box}

{tab Overview}

477MHz 6.5dB Heavy duty Aerial with spring Mobile One

The RF470FWMS is a dipole antenna commonly known as a "Raised Feed".

This antenna is the most popular of all UHF CB antennas due to its high gain and short length.

The RF470FWMS is strong, almost indestructible as it has no soldered internals that can break but rather is modular made up of parts that fit together and all are replaceable.

One of the key features of the RF470FWMS is the ability of using a large range of different antenna tops allowing for different colours, lengths and gains.

The RF470FWMS has a solid chrome plated 1/4 wave tube that is its own tuned ground plane so it is not needed to beearthed in any way and also allows the antenna to be placed in almost any location.

Supplied with 4.3 metres of excellent quality RG58cu coax, which is enough to mount in most locations on a vehicle, and is provided with a PL259 solder type connector.

The RF470FWMS has a heavy duty spring to absorb the vibration from moving vehicles and is ideal for bull bar mounting on all vehicles.

Features:

  • Gain: 6.5dbi
  • Super heavy duty
  • Extra thick antenna top
  • Ground independent
  • No tuning required
  • Easy installation
  • Stainless Steel, Brass & Nylon construction
  • High Power Capabale > 200watts
  • Made In Australia

5 Year Warranty

web_info_text: Mobile coverage for the UHF Commercial Radio Bands.
web_info_feature#6: Heavy Duty, Stainless Steel & Fibreglass Construction
web_info_feature#7: Complete Kit including Stainless Spring & Elevated Feed Base, 6.5dB & 3dB Antennas, RG58 Lead and Plug
ProductHTML:
EXPLORER 3/6.5db ELEVATED FEED UHF ANTENNA KIT

The 02635 antenna, is a ground Independent, 6.5* dB Gain,mobile antenna covering the UHF Commercial Radio Bands. Its high gain produces exceptional radio range coverage over distances not normally serviced by lower gain antennas. Its ground independence maintains a stable radiation pattern in all mobile mounting applications. Its robust construction ensures excellent longevity and performance.

Application

ProductHTML:
02629 UHF CB 477 MHz 9dB Heavy Duty Ground Independent Antenna

The 02629 antenna, is a 9dB gain, UHF High Gain, Heavy Duty Mobile antenna covering the 477 MHz Citizens Radio Band. This antenna is mechanically strong featuring a 5mm diameter tapered 17/7PH stainless steel radiator and heavy duty matching section, primarily suited to off road use. Although best suited to Bull Bar mounting, this antenna can also be used with a number of mounting accessories to cover the majority of mounting requirements.
A heavy duty, high gain, phased three stage radiator, presents this antenna with a narrow horizontal beamwidth anda gain higher than other antennas.
A robust matching section ensures that this antenna offersground plane independence as well as reliable mechanical stability.
The antenna comes complete with a terminated cable fitted with an FME connector and S0239 socket type base.

web_info_text: RFI CD28-37-70 end fed dipole antenna.
ProductHTML:
Utilising a patented matching circuit, the CD28-37-70 antennas are end fed dipole antennas combining a durable thermoplastic housing with a flexible tapered stainless whip section resistant to knocks and bends.

  • Performance - Exhibits 3 dB improvement in performanceover a 1/4 wave whip
  • Versatile - Ground independent design allows use in alternative mounting locations
  • Rugged - The transformer circuit is housed within a high impact thermoplastic moulding which is virtually indestructible
  • Unique termination method simplifies installation and re-cabling in the field
  • Designed, manufactured and patented in Australia [Australian Patent # 596830 and 656793]

    (1) MopoleTM antennas such as the CD28 have been shown to exhibit a 3dB improvement in received signal level in the field when compared to a quarter wave whip however in pattern tests exhibit only 1.5 to 2dB over a quarter wave (equivalent to 1.5-2dBi).

This improvement in performance can be attributed to a lower radiation angle level of these ground independent antennas.

ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

16dBi DUAL MIMO Yagi Antenna Kit for 4G-LTE 1800 MHz - Wireless Broadband

Connectivity

  • 4G LTE 1800MHz capable routers and modems.
  • Supplied with�Male SMA�fitting and Modem Patch Cable�to suit your modem's external antenna port.
  • For�Fixed Wireless, Outdoor installations.
  • Improves signal quality and downloadspeed by accessing the Dual Carrier and/or MIMO capabilitiesof the 4GLTE service.

Benefits - Who Uses These Antennas.

  • Homes, Offices, Contractors, rural and metropolitan.
  • Metro and Rural locations requiring more signal fromthe mobile phone tower.
  • Correctly installed, this antenna may turn an unreliable 4G internet connection into a fast broadband and quality VoIP service.

This antenna suits 4G LTE services using microwave frequency of 1800MHz. At this frequency, much signal can be absorbed by rain, fog, and vegetation that isin the direct line from the tower to your location. Also, the signal path needs to be line-of-sight. This doesn't meanyou need to be able to see the cell tower, it just means there must be no significant solid buildings, hills or mountains blocking thedirect path. Exceptions to this are built-up areas where thesignal can reflect off solid structures providing coverage. To get the best LTE connectivity you'll benefit form the increased Signal Strength and Signal-to-Noise ratio these directional antennas will provide.

Testimonial

"I've used this product for five jobs so far in the city and in regional areas such as Shepparton, Drouin and outer Geelong. I've got the signal from no bars to a great signal"

- Joe Vivona (Jim's Antennas CBD)

FAQs

How do a connect the common Telstra 4G USB modem pictured here?


This modem will require a couple of Telstra TS9 connections.
You'll need 2 flyleads (08751285) and 2 SMA adapters (30256700)

How do I connect a Telstra wifi device like the one below?


Ask Telstra for a Sierra Wireless dock which according to Telstra is around maybe $200 (pictured below).

It has SMA sockets on the back, so the Antenna kit willconnect directly to it.

{tab Assembly}

Assembly Instructions

Required Tools

A small amount of assembly is required.� You'll need a Philips Head Screw Driver, and an 8mm Spanner (10mm for larger Yagis).

Recommended Coax

We recommend the use of LMR-400 Coax cable for runs greater than 5m when connecting to 4G LTE 1800MHz. LMR-400 coax should be always be used in low signal areas.

Antenna Spacing

The antennas do not interfere with each other so long as they do not touch. However it is good practice to mount themwith at least one antenna width space between them and can even be mounted on separate poles.�

Which Antenna to which Modem Socket #

It's not critical which antenna connects to the Main (port 1)and which to the Aux (port 2) antenna socket on yourmodem.

 

1. Remove the u-Bolts and plastic
binding

2. Unscrew the Mounting plate from the�Yagi antenna's Boom

3. The boom has 2 sets of holes for vertical and horizontal polarisation

4. Fit the slant-pol bracket�to the mounting plate using short screws

5. Fit the boom to the slant-pol
bracket

6. Ensure boom is parallel with the edge of bracket & tighten screws

7. The antennas are now ready to be mounted. This would be the -45� antenna

8. Second antenna is mounted using other screw holes. This would be the +45� antenna

9. Install the antennas to a secure mast or pole and aim both antenna at the same tower

web_info_feature#4: Fully shielded low loss FME pre-terminated cable with A-87 (FME-MPL) adaptor supplied
ProductHTML:
X-glass™ Cellular Multiband 824-960MHz/1710-2170MHz

The X-glass™ antenna, XG884, is a genuine multi band antenna designed specifically for 3G850, GSM900/1800 and 3G2100 applications.

This antenna offers superb, true multi band performance

The XG884 utilises a slot radiator in the coupling box, with a patch element housed in the mounting foot.

The patch element is x-shaped to allow the coupling of multiple bands very effectively.

The whip element is fully moulded with dual phasing coils, the result being an antenna that provides abundant gain in all bands.

Featuring a new-look mounting foot and coupling box, XG884is supplied complete with a pre-terminated lead of low loss, fully shielded coaxial cable.

  • True multi band performance at 3G850, GSM900/1800 and 3G2100
  • Fully shielded low loss FME pre-terminated cable withA-87 (FME-MPL) adaptor supplied
  • Available with additional adaptors on request
  • XG884 supplied with 0dB and 3dB gain whips

ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

Blackhawk Wideband XPOL MIMO Antenna

Future proof your installations with a high grade, ruggedised wideband XPOL MIMO antenna panel.

This premium grade cellular antenna will satisfy 3G and 4G (including 4GX) capabilities for all the major networks in Australia and New Zealand and can be used for commercial and industrial 3G and 4G (4GX) applications.

The Blackhawk Wideband XPOL MIMO Antenna will provide theperfect solution for voice and data applications where high gain antennas are required.

Perfect for fixed wireless terminals and mobile broadband internet applications.

MIMO means 'multiple input and multiple output' and specifically refers to the technique for sending and receiving more than one data signal on the same frequency atthe same time using multiple paths.

In MIMO antenna systems, a transmitter sends multiple streams by multiple transmit antennas.

Where you have maximised the performance from your normalantenna to antenna set-up, to increase performance we need to increase the number of antennas.

And one way to do this is to utilise a MIMO antenna system.

The robust construction is perfectly suited to the extreme climate that applications will regularly experience across both Australia and New Zealand.

Features

  • Ruggedised construction for extreme conditions,heavy duty UV-PVC
  • Stainless steel mounting clamp included
  • Two integrated N Female connectors
  • Option to have LMR400/LMR 240 low loss cable lengths also available
  • Ideal for fixed wireless terminals and mobile broadband internet

ProductHTML:
Tunable AM Radio Loop Antenna

Designed specially for use with portable radios and will work with any radio that has an inbuilt ferrite rod antenna. There are NO Wires to connect and it uses no batteries or electricity, true green power!

It’s easy to use; just place the Tunable AM Loop Antenna beside your radio, tune the dial on top for a Strongsignal, then position the Loop for loud, clear & interference-free reception!

Also available is a Mini Tunable Loop, ideal for confined spaces, like bedside clock radios etc.

NO Batteries or Electricity -True Green Power!

ProductHTML:
Hi-Fi Loop - Matched Loop Antenna for Hi-Fi Receivers

PK’s Loop Antennas have Engineered an optimised AM Hi-Fi Antenna known as the “Matched Loop Antenna”, giving outstanding AM reception results from your AM Tuner, solving the age old problem of poor AM performance otherwise obtained with the “Mini-Loop” that Tuners are shipped with. It will dramatically improve the Signal to Noise Ratio on your AM reception.

Hearing is believing!

FEATURES:

  • A high performance Matched Loop Antenna designed to replace the poor performing Hi-Fi AM Mini loops supplied with Hi-Fi receivers and Bookshelf Systems.

  • The optimised broadband design requires no tuning.

  • Supplied with and configured for your choice of 5m of pre-made cable allowing you to mount the antenna well away from the receiver and any sources of interference, suchas found in Home Cinema racks etc... Internal Dip Switch Settings allow user selection of cable length used and optimum matching to your radio.

  • Suits, SONY, BOSE, TIVOLI (HENRY KLOSS), DENON, PIONEER, YAMAHA and most others with Loop Antenna terminals.

  • This is a great new product with a design not seen elsewhere, it will really improve your Tuners AM performance! PK's Loop Antennas solve the age old problem ofpoor AM reception on Hi-Fi Receivers!

ProductHTML:
PK Loop Antennas are proudly designed and manufactured inAustralia

An outdoor AM Loop antenna with remote tuning for buildings constructed with steel roofs and frames ( like sheds or caravans) or those with re-inforced concrete.

The Loop mounts outdoors and a single co axial cable connects it to the tuning control box.

There is an output for a wired connection to your AM radio / receivers external antenna and ground terminals

The tuning system is sharp and peaks right on station, boosting weak signals whilst rejecting interference and enhancing reception quality.

  • Power source - Control box

( NOT SUPPLIED )

Set Up

  • Connect the coax cable between the Loop antenna and the control box connecter marked "LOOP"
  • Connect your Radio / Receiver to the connector marked "Radio" on the control box
  • Insert a fresh 9v Alkaline battery ( Not supplied ) into the control box
  • Tune your Radio to the desired Stations' frequency
  • Slowly turn the manual tune control to the point of strongest reception
  • Orientate the Loop Antenna to obtain the clearest reception; Edge on towards the transmitter is best.

web_info_text: Increase reception range for a Bluetooth (2.4 GHz) receiver when installed to a 19" equipment rack or any other (shielded) enclosure.
ProductHTML:
Audac BAE100 Bluetooth antenna extender kit

Audac have released the BAE100, a Bluetooth antenna extension kit for the PRE116 and PRE126 stereo preamplifiers and the BMP40 SourceCon card.

The BAE100 Bluetooth antenna extender kit, allows increasement of reception range for a Bluetooth (2.4 GHz) receiver when installed to a 19" equipment rack or any other(shielded) enclosure.

The BAE100 comes with everything you need to extend your Bluetooth signal:

  • 7dBi Antenna
  • Preterminated SMA antenna cable - 1 Metre
  • Preterminated SMA antenna cable - 5 Metre
  • Multifuctional Bracket (Rack-mount / Surface-mount)


The multifunctional bracket allows the antenna to be mountedto a standard rack-strip

(hint: use the preterminated 1 metre cable to allow you to mount the antenna to the front mounting strip of your rack, so that the Bluetooth signal is not having to penetrate through the steel of the equipment rack).

The same bracket can also be used to mount the antenna toa wall / ceiling (hint: this is where the included 5 metre cable comes in handy).

Tru-Band� antennas are a revolutionary new VHF Only (Band3 or Block A)�antenna for Australian capital cities that have been designed for the digital-only TV environment.

Hills understand the potential for 4G/LTE interference with its range of Tru-Series antenna's in certain installations areas and conditions.

Supporting our product Hills are introducing a range of products which are included with 4G filtering on selected Tru-Series Antennas allowing you the best performing installation and system possible regardless of location or 4G proximity.

  • Lightweight and compact
  • Fully designed and manufactured in Australia. Registered design


4G Filtered Customer Benefits:�

  • To reject LTE/4G services that could cause interference with current Digital TV broadcasts
  • With one integrated product it will eliminate the needto purchase separately a in-line filter
  • greater than 50dB rejection of the LTE frequencies�

These antenna’s are most likely to be installed in a metropolitan location where the density of 4G/LTE usage will be at a peak and so the extra rejection of a filter will significantly increase the interfering signal attenuation.� This has been implemented inside the standard balun housing with changes to the current PCB circuit/layoutetc. designed with an included on-board 4G/LTE (694MHz) low pass filter to prevent any type of out-of-band interference.

LOG-PERIODIC AERIALS WITH F CONNECTOR - FRACARRO

Since 1933 Gruppo Fracarro has been offering its customers high quality products and solutions renowned for its innovation and technology. To expand into the international market, along with Fracarro Iberica S.A., new companies have been established, as Fracarro France, Fracarro (UK) Ltd and Fracarro Portugal.With a Fracarro agency in Thailand and a network ofdistributors worldwide, Fracarro is now even closer to the market.

As a market leader in the reception and distribution of audio-videodata signals and security, Fracarro is able to provide comprehensive information and assistance worldwide. It also offers professional assistance for pre/post sales, technical training and manuals to continually update information and professional growth, as well as creating software for project designs.

Fracarro Log Periodic antennas are now shipping with professional F connector fittings. A unique connector protection boot, an injection moulded F fitting and a new nose cone assembly are making the new LP345F, LP34F, and LP45F instant successes.

Fracarro's main goal has always been to achieve the highest quality and performance on the products and services they supply. Fracarro Radioindustrie S.p.A. has been successful in achieving this with the Fracarro Quality System being officially recognized on an international level with ISO9001 certification. This certification confirms Fracarro products are highly reliable, and that they have a modern, efficient and professional sales organization.

FEATURES:

  • For assembly in vertical or horizontal position without additional accessories

It is estimated that more than 70,000 customers will opt-in to this program by December 2013 (May '13 Awarded Melb Switchover Scheme, viewed on July 29 2013, click to view more information).

ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

KCC/KLAKIT KINGRAY 5 CHANNEL FTA HEADEND

Kingray Professional Series

Kingray TV signal distribution products have been the unwavering choice of the TV installation industry virtually from the advent of television services in Australia. For over 50 years Kingray amplifiers, converters and modulators have consistently delivered crystal clear, interference freeTV reception across the country and more recently across theAsia Pacific region.

Today as we witness a growing convergence of ‘Free to Air’ television, subscription services,‘pay per view’ and Internet delivery techniques;Kingray remains at the forefront of this technological evolution with cost effective, pragmatic solutions to both terrestrial and satellite based signal distribution methodologies.

The new Kingray Professional Series sets a new standardin Headend equipment, engineered from the ground up to meet the exacting demands of system designers, carriers and regulators in both Australia and around the world.

At the heart of a Kingray Professional Series installation lies the KR110 19” rack with its KLA110 45 dB Launch Amplifier and low noise power supply; to ensuretotal system flexibility, up to 10 KCC110 Channel Converters/Processors, 10 KDM110 Dual Input Digital Modulators or a combination of either maybe mounted.

Ease of installation, commissioning, and functionality were prime considerations during the development phase of the Kingray Professional Series, practical solutions like the simple daisy chain signal couplers, LED status indicators, upgradeable firmware and PC based calibration reflect the no-nonsense innovation incorporated in this remarkable product range.

To add further to the Kingray Professional Series, flexibility, particularly in smaller systems where a single ‘stand alone’ processor or modulator is required, it may be powered with a standard Kingray PSK24 power supply.

The Kingray Professional Series is proudly manufacturedin Australia and is accompanied by a comprehensive three year warranty.

{tab KR110}

KR110 Headend Rack

The KR110 is a robust, dual purpose rack that will hold up to 10 modules and a KLA110 launch amplifier/power supply.The rack can be wall mounted or installed in a 19” rack simply by reversing the side support brackets.

Features

  • Strong press metal design
  • Durable high quality powder coat finish
  • Quick and easy to assemble

{tab KLA110}

KLA110 Launch Amplifier/Power Supply

The unique design of the KLA110 incorporates a LaunchAmplifier, Power Supply and Programming Interface. Designed to be mounted in the middle of the KR110. The power supply is designed to power 10 modules, it can also provide external power to a masthead or pre amp if required.�

Features - Amplifier

  • High output
  • Low noise figure
  • Low insertion loss, input separator / output combiner.
  • Adjustable output level
  • Adjustable gain
  • -30 dB test point
  • Wide bandwidth 44-862 MHz
  • Embedded web based program
  • Efficient low noise switch mode power supply

{tab KCC110}

KCC110 Digital Channel Converter/Processor

The KCC110 is the most advanced digital channel converter/processor available. Whether the KCC110 is being used to output the same channel as it’s input channel (processing) or a different output channel to it’s input channel (converting), it is capable of adjacent channel operation on both input and output.

  • Very high MER level, up to 36 dB*
  • Input AGC circuitry
  • �High linearity and low phase noise
  • Adjustable output power level control
  • Resolution 125 kHz steps
  • Adjustable bandwidth
  • Stand alone or 19” rack mountable
  • �Programmable via any computer with an Ethernet connection.�
  • �Programmable via USB when using as a ‘stand alone’ module.
  • Remote control capability via KLA110 within a VPN
  • Precision engineered die-cast housing

web_info_text: THE NEW SATELLITE RECEPTION AND DISTRIBUTION TECHNOLOGY OVER A SINGLE CABLE
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

KMS-F1 SINGLE WIRE MULTISTACKER - KINGRAY FOX App. F30963

Kingray Multistacker
The Kingray KMS-F1 satellite multistacker is designed specifically for use with the Foxtel satellite platform.

It combines 2 horizontal & 2 vertical satellite services from 2 orbital locations. It then restacks the vertical polarity transponder services onto a horizontal polarity, therefore allowing a single cable distribution method for up to 32 satellite transponders plus FTA servicesonce combined via a diplexer after the multistacker. In comparison to the existing distribution method via a 5 wire multiswitch system, your labour & material costs will besignificantly cheaper.

Not only is this distribution method to be used for new SMATV installations but it allows the combined FTA � Satellite to be distributed down an existing single cable RFdistribution network that is fitted with a minimum of RG6 coaxial cable.

The stacker has been fitted with a 5 position dip switch which is switched to match the State installed. This allows Foxtel to make better use of Transponder space in the event that the total 32 transponders are used.

{tab Specifications}

  • Input Frequency Range: 950-2350 MHz
  • Output Frequency Range: 950-2350 MHz
  • Typical Input Power Range: 65-85dBuV
  • Typical Output Power Range 80-85dBuV

  • 1 x Power Supply
  • 3 x F-Type Terminators

The Hills Q-Amp Digital VHF/UHF Amplifier is a fully flexible high gain masthead amplifier that offers full adjustment for local / remote reception in both the VHF and UHF bands. Kingray Introduces the MDA15 Low Noise Masthead Distribution Amplifier Range

Kingray are proud to announce the release of the MDA15 range of low noise masthead amplifiers. The characteristics of the IC selected provide a very low noise figure and an output figure comparable to
many distribution amplifiers, hence the name Masthead Distribution Amplifier (MDA). The MDA15 range consists of three models; MDA15V(VHF only), MDA15U (UHF only), and MDA15W (Wideband).

Whether the amplifier is used as a Masthead or Distribution Amplifier, the low noise figure, capacity for multiple channels with low distortion and a high output provides a solution for all installations and is proven especially effective in problem reception areas.

ProductHTML:
CAT01 4 WAY RF OVER CAT5 AMPLIFIER KINGRAY

Kingray is proud to announce the introduction of the CATTV� range; this product line will transform the way television signals are delivered over CAT5 cable.
For many years CAT5/6 cable has been used to distribute various types of data throughout offices, schools, hospitalsand even private homes.

More recently CAT5/6 cabling has been used to reticulate many different signal sources such as audio, video and HDMI.
The Kingray CATTV� product now makes it possible to add terrestrial TV to the signals distributed using CAT5/6 cabling.

High output distribution amplifier � capable of supplyingquality signal to up to four television receivers.
Incorporates master gain and tilt controls, plus individual gain controls for each outlet, delivering a balanced output level regardless of cable lengths.

Available separately is the Kingray KLE02 impedance matching balun cable for connection between the RJ45 wall outlet and the television ensuring optimal performance at all times.

  • Incorporates master gain and tilt controls, plus individual gain controls for each outlet, delivering a balanced output level regardless of cable lengths.

web_info_text: A slope equaliser is used for long cable runs where attenuation (loss) is an issue.
web_info_feature#2: Attenuates the lower frequencies more than the higher frequencies
ProductHTML:
A slope equaliser is used to compensate the unequal attenuation (loss) at various frequencies through long cableruns so that the signal is equal at the end of the cable no matter the frequency. E.g. -1 dB attenuation at 45 MHz and -18 dB attenuation at 862 MHz which is the FTA band.

The LE862F will adjust for that effect by attenuating thelower frequencies more than the higher frequencies.

Click here to read more about Spaun Satellite Distribution

This is a small 10 or 20 dB selectable FTA amp. It is ideal to be used in front of a splitter to overcome its losses when needing to boost the signal level for more outlets. This unit will generally deliver enough additional gain for approximately 4 to 8 outlets.

Click here to read more about Spaun Satellite Distribution

web_info_text: The MD100U is a (DSB) Double Side Band phase locked loop (PLL) mono modulator.
ProductHTML:
UHF AUDIO / VIDEO MODULATOR

The MD100U is a (DSB) Double SideBand phase locked loop (PLL) mono modulator. It allows an installer "on-the-job" choice of RF output frequencies to reticulate audio/video signals from Video Cameras, Satellite Receivers, CCTV, VCR's, Laser Disks and AM/FM Tuners into distribution systems for hotels, motels, home units, caravan parks, private homes, schools, business premises and shop displays.

The AV inputs are RCA connectors with the Sound IF input and the RF output as 'F' t ype connectors.

NOTE: There are a number of cheap modulators on the market that have left and right channel inputs, however they are not a true stereo unit. When selecting a stereo modulator, ensure you are getting true stereo and not mono.

Features

  • 2 models cover whole range - MD100VS 44-470 MHz, MD100US 470-860 MHz
  • Agile in 250 kHz steps
  • Adjustable output level 63-103 dB uV
  • Can be rack mounted
  • Stereo sound/mono option (Internal switch)
  • Fully shielded die-cast housing
  • Can be locally or remotely powered
  • Phase lock looped for stability

{tab FAQs}
Should I use a DC power supply, like a PSK06, or AC power supply like the PSK08?

When in doubt, choose DC. The common DC power supplies are the black PSK06 or the white KPS06. Free-to-air splitters (FSPxF) have a "single port power pass", meaning that the power supply in the room below will only work at one of the TV points. The other TV outlets around the house will not let the voltage travel up to the TV antenna. These splitters will work fine with AC or DC power supplies.

Splitters that work with both free-to-air and satellite (SPxF) will only perform well when a DC power supply is used. Even if the house does not have satellite TV, many installers will use this kind of splitter as they allow the house owner or tenant to place the power supply anywhere in the antenna system and it will work. If you don't know whichsystem is yours, choose a DC power supply.

{/tabs}

web_info_text: MHV25F the ideal amplifier for VHF only installations.
web_info_feature#3: AC or DC power supply compatible
ProductHTML:
MHV25F 25DB VHF MASTHEAD AMPLIFIER - KINGRAY

Kingray are the only manufacturer still producing television amplifiers in Australia and are proud to announcethe release of the latest addition to the Edge Series of masthead amplifiers.
Local design and manufacturing allows Kingray to gather market feedback and develop products which suit
Australia�s unique digital television environment.
The MHV25F is designed for todays digital television environment and specifically for areas where there is
VHF transmission only.
The Band 1,2,4 and 5 filtering ensure only channels 6 to 12 are amplified, eliminating all unwanted frequencies
including those in the LTE band.
The amplifier is designed to provide a very flat response across Band 3, the maximum output of 25dB with
a 10dB gain control and 50dB of LTE rejection makes the MHV25F the ideal amplifier for VHF only installations.

Features:

  • High output
  • Low noise
  • Adjustable gain
  • AC or DC power supply compatible
  • LTE and low band filtering
  • LED power indicator

Specifications:

Frequency range: VHF: 174 - 230 MHz

Max gain: VHF: 25 dB

Noise figure: VHF: < 2.5 dB

LTE rejection: > 50 dB

Output figure: 105 dB DIN45004B @ (-60 dB IMR)

Gain control: 10 dB

Supply: PSK08/F or PSK06/F

web_info_text: F Type masthead designed to amplify a UHF antenna and diplex a separate VHF antenna or amplify the UHF component of a combined antenna.
ProductHTML:
MHW43FS Fully Shielded Masthead Amplifier

The NEW Kingray Edge series has been engineered to provide a future proof solution with switchable LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection.

The Edge series features links allowing the amplifier to be configured to best suit the installation now and in the future. The range includes both wideband and UHF only modelsused to amplify the whole UHF band or alternatively by re-positioning the links, all services above 694 MHz are filtered, blocking future LTE transmissions.

In addition to LTE filtering some wideband models in the Edge series include user selectable low band filtering to eliminate all services below 174 MHz.

The Edge series is designed to meet the needs of the television reception industry now and into the future.

F Type shielded masthead designed to amplify separate VHFand UHF antennas or a combined VHF/UHF antenna.

The Edge Series mastheads can also be powered by either 14 Volt DC, 17.5 (See power supply section). The increased use of Surface Mount technology has resulted in the ability to produce a smaller PCB with increased reliability and performance.

{tab FAQs}

My masthead isn't working all the sudden! Why?
In 2015, we are switching on 4G LTE signals, so we need to filter out the signal. We would say please read the Kingray instructions, but who are we kidding! We don't read instructions either! So here'ssome pictures:
Click on images for larger version


Fig1. Above the F type socket on the left, you have 2 jumper plugs running horizontally.


Fig2. Remove them by hand.


Fig3. And plug them in to the right, under D.


Fig4. The top one is done.


Fig5. And now the bottom one is done.

The problem is fixed... We hope!

web_info_text: Protecting your television from LTE mobile broadband interference
web_info_feature#1: Switchable LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection
ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

MHU35F 35DB UHF MASTHEAD AMPLIFIER WITH LTE/4G FILTERINGKINGRAY

Protecting your television from LTE mobile broadband interference

Australia and New Zealand are about to embark on a communications revolution, which will include possibly the biggest changes to the reception of television services ever.With the switch off of analogue television transmissions completed by late 2013, a substantial part of the existing television spectrum will be reallocated and auctioned off by the government, generating what is now universally referred to as the “digital dividend”. To facilitate this, some existing digital channels will need to be reallocated or moved to a differentpart of the spectrum, this is commonly known as restacking. Once this has occurred, the freed up spectrum from the “digital dividend” will be reassigned for other digital services. The most likely use for this spectrum is for high speed mobile broadband applications using 4G or LTE(Long Term Evolution) technology. Using this “digital dividend” for emerging technology is going to provide substantial benefits for the general public. However it willnot be without its challenges for the television reception industry, it is most likely many television installations will experience significant interference to their digital television reception.

Features:

  • The NEW Kingray Edge series of masthead amplifiers hasbeen engineered to provide a future proof solution with switchable LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection.
  • The Edge series features links allowing the amplifier to be configured to best suit the installation now and in the future.
  • The range includes both wideband and UHF only models used to amplify the whole UHF band or alternatively by re-positioning the links, all services above 694 MHz are filtered, blocking future LTE transmissions.
  • In addition to LTE filtering some wideband models in the Edge series include user selectable low band filtering to eliminate all services below 174 MHz.
  • The Edge series is designed to meet the needs of the television reception industry now and into the future.

ProductHTML:
MHU35FS UHF 35DB SHIELDED F TYPE MASTHEAD AMPLIFIER - KINGRAY

Protecting your television from LTE mobile broadband interference

Australia and New Zealand are about to embark on a communications revolution, which will include possibly the biggest changes to the reception of television services ever.With the switch off of analogue television transmissions completed by late 2013, a substantial part of the existing television spectrum will be reallocated and auctioned off by the government, generating what is now universally referred to as the “digital dividend”. To facilitate this, some existing digital channels will need to be reallocated or moved to a differentpart of the spectrum, this is commonly known as restacking. Once this has occurred, the freed up spectrum from the “digital dividend” will be reassigned for other digital services. The most likely use for this spectrum is for high speed mobile broadband applications using 4G or LTE(Long Term Evolution) technology. Using this “digital dividend” for emerging technology is going to provide substantial benefits for the general public. However it willnot be without its challenges for thetelevision reception industry, it is most likely many television installations will experience significant interference to their digital television reception.

Features:

  • The NEW Kingray Edge series of masthead amplifiers hasbeen engineered to provide a future proof solution with switchable LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection.
  • The Edge series features links allowing the amplifier to be configured to best suit the installation now and in the future.
  • The range includes both wideband and UHF only models used to amplify the whole UHF band or alternatively by re-positioning the links, all services above 694 MHz are filtered, blocking future LTE transmissions.
  • In addition to LTE filtering some wideband models in the Edge series include user selectable low band filtering to eliminate all services below 174 MHz.
  • The Edge series is designed to meet the needs of the television reception industry now and into the future.

ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

Are you protected from LTE

The MHW35F is a VHF/UHF masthead amplifier with the capability to amplify signals either from a combined or separate VHF or UHF antenna; it has F connections is sheilded and is part of the Kingray Edge Series range.

The Kingray Edge series has been engineered to provide a future proof solution with LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection.

The range includes both wideband and UHF only models, allservices above 694 MHz are filtered, rejecting LTE transmissions.

In addition to LTE filtering most wideband models in the Edge series include low band filtering to eliminate all services below 174 MHz

The Edge series is designed to meet the needs of the television reception industry now and well into the future.

  • VHF / UHF amplifier
  • Separate or combined inputs.
  • LTE filtering
  • Band 1 and 2 filtering
  • VHF and UHF gain controls
  • F type connections
  • 100% weatherproof case

In the Box

  • MHW35F
  • Cable Tie
  • Installation Manual
  • KPS06 power supply

Product Specifications

ELECTRICAL SPECIFICATION

Frequency Range
VHF: 174 - 230 MHz, UHF: 520 - 694 MHz
Maximum Gain
VHF: 22-26 dB, UHF: 35 dB
Gain Control Range
VHF: Tilt Control 16-12 dB, UHF 15 dB
Maximum Output Level
108dBµV @ - 60 dB IMR (DIN45004B)
Noise Figure
VHF: < 3 dB, UHF: < 2.5 dB
LTE Filter
-25dB @ 750MHz
Low Band Filter
-30 dB
Pager Filter
-25 dB @ 148 MHz and 158 MHz
FM Filter
-25 dB @ 88 - 108 MHz

MECHANICAL SPECIFICATION

Input Connector
F type
Output Connector
F type

POWER SUPPLY

Suitable plug pack
PSK06/08, PSK06/08F, KPS06/08, KPS06/08F
Power Consumption
80 mA

{tab FAQs}
My masthead isn't working all the sudden! Why?
In 2015, we are switching on 4G LTE signals, so we need to filter out the signal. We would say please read the Kingray instructions, but who are we kidding! We don't read instructions either! So here'ssome pictures:
Click on images for larger version


Fig1. Above the F type socket on the left, you have 2 jumper plugs running horizontally.


Fig2. Remove them by hand.


Fig3. And plug them in to the right, under D.


Fig4. The top one is done.


Fig5. And now the bottom one is done.

The problem is fixed... We hope!

ProductHTML:
MHW35FS UHF/VHF 35DB SHIELDED F TYPE MASTHEAD AMPLIFIER - KINGRAY

Protecting your television from LTE mobile broadband interference

Australia and New Zealand are about to embark on a communications revolution, which will include possibly the biggest changes to the reception of television services ever.With the switch off of analogue television transmissions completed by late 2013, a substantial part of the existing television spectrum will be reallocated and auctioned off by the government, generating what is now universally referred to as the “digital dividend”. To facilitate this, some existing digital channels will need to be reallocated or moved to a differentpart of the spectrum, this is commonly known as restacking. Once this has occurred, the freed up spectrum from the “digital dividend” will be reassigned for other digital services. The most likely use for this spectrum is for high speed mobile broadband applications using 4G or LTE(Long Term Evolution) technology. Using this “digital dividend” for emerging technology is going to provide substantial benefits for the general public. However it willnot be without its challenges for thetelevision reception industry, it is most likely many television installations will experience significant interference to their digital television reception.

Features:

  • The NEW Kingray Edge series of masthead amplifiers hasbeen engineered to provide a future proof solution with switchable LTE/4G filtering to maximise interference rejection.
  • The Edge series features links allowing the amplifier to be configured to best suit the installation now and in the future.
  • The range includes both wideband and UHF only models used to amplify the whole UHF band or alternatively by re-positioning the links, all services above 694 MHz are filtered, blocking future LTE transmissions.
  • In addition to LTE filtering some wideband models in the Edge series include user selectable low band filtering to eliminate all services below 174 MHz.
  • The Edge series is designed to meet the needs of the television reception industry now and into the future.

web_info_text: Super compact housing and exceptional LTE rejection.
web_info_feature#1: Unwanted 4G LTE signal is attenuated by 55dB
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

Kingray FL694LP 55dB LTE Filter

Kingray are proud to announce the release of the Kingray FL694LP 55dB LTE Filter low pass filter. Features include a super compact housing and exceptional LTE rejection. The filter passes all frequencies between 5-694MHz, all frequencies above 694MHz (Aust channel 51 / NZ channel 48) are attenuated, at 750MHz the filters attenuation is 55dB.

The filter is designed to be installed after the antenna and before any amplifier or splitter in the system. If the filter is required to be installed outdoors it is recommended it be installed inside
either a Kingray MHB001 weatherproof housing.

It's also small enough to fit into many Kingray masthead amplifiers such as:

- Wideband: MHW25FE, MHW25F, MHW35F
- UHF: MHU25F, MHU35F

{tab Specifications}

Insertion Loss: <2dB
Stop Band attenuation: >55dB @750MHz
Input & Output connectors: F Type
Dimensions: 13 x 39 mm

web_info_text: 526 � 568MHz Band Pass Filter.
For filtering out 4G LTE signal for clear TV reception
web_info_feature#1: Comes in an outdoor enclosure and cable ties
web_info_feature#2: Generally mounts on mast under TV antenna
ProductHTML:
FD02 45-694MHz LOW PASS FILTER

Unwanted channels and future 4G (LTE) band stop filters.

Installers all over Australia are finding that when they have a translator they are chasing in the UHF band and also have a group of channels at a lower frequency. There can be an issue where the weaker lower channels are present, makingthe TV set lock in on the weaker lower frequency channels and allocate LCN’s of 350 to 355 on the wanted channelgroup.

Some installers disconnect the antenna socket whilst the TV scans the lower channels. However this is not a permanentsolution as the next re-scan the TV will go back to the wrong settings making it difficult for the unskilled householder to find their channels.

Matchmaster has the solution after speaking with many installers. We have developed a full range of filters that will solve this problem as well as help eliminate future 4G (LTE) transmission interference.

It is expected that at 5km from a LTE tower that levels of up to 111dBuV may be received by a standard non filtered TV antenna. This will overload the TV tuner and create inter-modulation distortion in mast head amplifiers.

These filters are the solution to both these issues today, in the future and limited stocks are now available.

Features

  • Low pass filter
  • Frequency 45-694MHz
  • FM+VHF/UHF(6-12)(28-51)
  • Low pass through loss = 4.87dB
  • 750MHz loss > 84dB

Specifications

web_info_text: More than just a 4G filter - this filter allows through just Channel Block B
web_info_feature#2: Block filters are ideal for when you receive signal from multiple TV transmitters, but only want one.

web_info_text: 3 in 8 out ports.
ProductHTML:
Doss SMS38F multiswitch can be used with a dual LNB to distribute satellite TV signals to multiple receivers from asingle dish and LNB. It features 3 input which means it allows you to combine a dual LNB plus an input from a terrestrial antenna.

This product saves the hassle of installing several satellite antennas for your multiple television subscribers needs.

It distributes your satellite system up to 8 output receivers.

Features

  • 3 In ports (Dual LNB and Terrestrial antenna)
  • 8 Out ports

Specification

  • Frequency Range:
    • SAT : 950-2050 MHz
    • Terrestrial : 5-862 MHz
  • Gain:
    • SAT: 4dB
    • Terrestrial: -16±1 dB
  • Current consumption on each output: 60mA
  • Max current to LNB: 400mA
This is a 2 input 12 output multiswitch that is used typically in domestic installations or up to 6 Pay TV outlets.

4 way multiswitch. The SMK range of cascaded multiswitches have the benefit of being snapped together instead of havingto make up small coaxial leads with F connectors. The PA5082adaptors are used to do this. The last cascaded multiswitch through ports must be terminated with 75 ohm capacitive loads, so use product PR1007.

web_info_text: Diplexer used for combining or separating satellite and terrestrial signals
ProductHTML:
DSTD DIPLEXER SATELLITE & FTA 'F' TYPE

Diplexer is used for combining (and separating) satelliteand terrestial signals.

You may use one diplexer with the satellite dish and antennain the roof to combine the signals.

When working with higher freq (satellite) use low loss cable, like RG6Q rather than RG59.

Terminations should be with F type connectors.

Another diplexer may be located close to the satellite box and terrestial receiver where it will separate back out bothsignals from the same run of coax.

You can hide the diplexer inside the wall and connect it to the rear of a double F type wall plate like the PR3860 or PR3880

Foxtel Approved (F10541).

• 12dB low band VHF filter
  • PAL type connector

web_info_text: 2-way Splitter/Combiner with DC & IR Passthrough
web_info_feature#1: Ideal for IR over coax installations
ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

DC & IR Passing 2-way Splitter / Combiner

The Model 2512 DC & IR Passing 2-way Splitter/Combiner is a bi-directional 2-way splitter/combiner that provides a 1 GHz bandwidth and is ideal for antenna and coaxial cable operations. The splitter/combiner can be used for two applications. It can be used to split a signal from a source or combine signals from multiple sources onto one coax run. Use a DC passing splitter whenever DC IR signals are present on the coax. Also available in a 25 pack as Model 2512-25.

Features

  • 1 GHz bandwidth
  • 3.5 dB insertion loss
  • Passes DC IR signals on the coax
  • Use as signal splitter or combiner
{tab FAQs}
Any recommendations when using this splitter with IR-Over-Coax product?
Yes, we recommend using DC blockers in IR systems. The trick with IR is voltages. A standard splitter uses diodes, meaning voltage only flows in one direction. These splitters allow voltages to flow in both directions. Having products like unearthed TVs in the system can cause issues. It's recommended that DC blockers (RLACC130) are used at the TV sockets to avoid voltages leaking back into the system. This should ensure reliable IRperformance.
{/tabs}

web_info_text: 4-way Splitter/Combiner with DC & IR Passthrough
web_info_feature#1: Ideal for IR over coax installations
ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

DC & IR Passing 4-way Splitter / Combiner

The Model 2514 DC & IR Passing 4-way Splitter/Combiner is a bi-directional 4-way splitter / combiner that provides a 1 GHz bandwidth and is ideal for antenna and coaxial cable operations. The splitter/combiner can be used for two applications. It can be used to split a signal from a source or combine signals from multiple sources onto one coax run. Use a DC passing splitter whenever DC IR signals are present on the coax. Also available in a 25 pack as Model 2514-25.

Features

  • 1 GHz bandwidth
  • 8 dB insertion loss
  • Passes DC IR signals on the coax
  • Use as signal splitter or combiner
{tab FAQs}
Any recommendations when using this splitter with IR-Over-Coax product?
Yes, we recommend using DC blockers in IR systems. The trick with IR is voltages. A standard splitter uses diodes, meaning voltage only flows in one direction. These splitters allow voltages to flow in both directions. Having products like unearthed TVs in the system can cause issues. It's recommended that DC blockers (RLACC130) are used at the TV sockets to avoid voltages leaking back into the system. This should ensure reliable IRperformance.
{/tabs}

web_info_feature#2: �F� type connections designed to operate from 2GHz down to 5MHz permitting use in interact
web_info_feature#3: For both VHF and UHF frequencies
ProductHTML:
High quality satellite & cable TV compatible 75ohm splitters in zinc diecast housing.
  • "F" type connections designedto operate from 2GHz down to 5 MHz permitting use in interactive systems
  • Nickel plated zinc die-cast housings
  • Tongue & groove housing design provides high RFI shielding for �120 dB
  • Frequency response of 5-2400 MHz
  • High precision machine threaded F-ports
  • Power pass 12 V DC, 500 mA all ports
  • Usable for special channels and return channels
  • Impedance: 75Ω
  • For both VHF and UHF frequencies
  • Built in grounding block
  • No IR passing
  • Can be used to combine
  • Output dB loss was tested @ 2050mHZ

web_info_feature#1: Flat ribbon cable for tight spaces
ProductHTML:
Flat Antenna Cable for Window/Door Installs

This unassuming piece of cable can be a lifesaver. Its flat ribbon cable style means it will fit in door jams and other tight spaces without damage. Just 265mm long with F-type female connectors on either end. Female to female joiner so you can place it inline with two standard F-type coax cables.

Features:
- Flat ribbon cable for tight spaces
- Low signal drop
- Quality F-type connections

Specifications:
Weight: 25g
Length: 265mm

web_info_text: The RL-RF380's patented design is for whole-house video distribution with IR control
web_info_feature#6: Must be remotely powered by an IR Modulator when using the IR Control
ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

RL-RF380 - 3 input / 8 output RF Distribution Module

The RL-RF380's patented design is for whole-house videodistribution with IR control. The splitters have reverse path IR control, that when combined with other products inthe IR range, will allow you to control the AV inputs from other locations. The RL-RF380 must be remotely powered by anIR Modulator when using the IR Control.

  • Inputs: 3
  • Outputs: 8
  • Output Run Distance: 60m
  • IR Control: Yes
  • Patented
  • Must be remotely powered by an IR Modulator when using the IR Control

Features

  • Active, low loss combiner and splitter with 3 inputs, 8 outputs
  • Includes gain control for Free To Air input to eliminate problems due to high/low signal strength. 
  • When combined with gain control on modulator, allowscomplete balancing of signals
  • FM trap On/Off switch to filter 88-108MHz signals from transferrring through to output ports to eliminate FM interference to TV reception
{tab Specifications}
  • Output Frequency Pass: 30KHz to 850MHz
  • Number of output: 8
  • Number of input (Modulator / ANT): 3
  • Gain / Loss
    • ANT: +2dB
    • Modulator: +3dB 
  • Output run distance: 60 metres
  • Isolation (Modulator inputs to ANT): -80dB
  • Weight (g): 405
  • Size (mm): 135 (l) x 69 (w) x 22 (d)
  • Power supply
    • Input: 110 - 240V AC
    • Output: 12V DC - 1.5A Switch Mode
  • Connections - Power Out 1.8mm length with 2.1mm minijack socket

{/tabs}

web_info_text: Superior intermodulation distortion and second harmonic performance
ProductHTML:
AS3FG2 3 WAY F TYPE SPLITTER 5 - 1000MHz FOXTEL APPROVEDF30224

Features:

  • Superior intermodulation distortion and second harmonic performance
  • Excellent return loss and port-to-port isolation in the return band
  • Patented DSM seizure technology provides increased spring retention for better surface contact (patent#6450836)
  • Gold-plated, beryllium copper construction for better corrosion resistance, impedance matching, and prevention of common path distortion
  • 6 kV surge withstand, guaranteed second orderharmonics performance after 5 surges to each port of 6 kV (per IEEE.C62.41.1991 Category A3)
  • Tin-plated back plate provides minimum -110 dB shielding effectiveness and superior defence against long-term corrosion factors
  • -60 dBmV spurious signals and 2nd harmonics with a +55 dBmV input carrier
  • Weather-sealed “F” ports
  • Machine threaded, flat “F” ports

web_info_text: The WallMate� is the original self drilling plasterboard anchor
web_info_feature#1: WallMate� feature an effective drill point for easy penetration of plasterboard
web_info_feature#2: Both the screw and the WallMate� can be easily removed without losing the anchor inside the cavity.
web_info_feature#3: The low profile head allows for flush fixing.
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

WMZ 8G X 20MM WALLBOARD ANCHOR - RAMSET

The WallMate� is the original self drilling plasterboard anchor. The WallMate� would probably be the quickest and easiest plasterboard anchor to install and remove.

Features:

  • WallMate� feature an effective drill point for easy penetration of plasterboard and fast installation.
  • If a long screw is used, this point will break away soas not to restrict achievement of a firm fix.
  • The anchor's screw thread profile is designed for efficient cutting and positive grip.
  • Both the screw and the WallMate� can be easily removedwithout losing the anchor inside the cavity.
  • The low profile head allows for flush fixing.

{tab Specifications}

Material - Zinc Composite
Head Style - Flush Phillips #2
Fixing Method - Fixture Aligned
Setting Method - Rotation
Anchoring Method - Thread Forming
Screw Gauges - 6-8
Drilled Hole Diameters* - 8mm
Anchor Lengths - 42mm
Minimum Screw Length - 20mm
Substrates - Plasterboard, Dry Partition Walls, Aerated Concrete (with 8mm pre-drilled hole)

web_info_text: Channel Master CM-9521A Light Duty Antenna Rotators are perfect for rotating UHF, VHF, 6-Meter, TV, FM or magnetic loop antennas.
web_info_feature#1: Accepts TV antenna mast up to 2.0 in. diameter
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

9521A LIGHT DUTY ANTENNA ROTATOR - CHANNEL MASTER

Channel Master's rotators are built strong and feature weatherproof, one-piece cast-aluminum housings. Theyhave precision metal gears and steel thrust bearings for lasting durability. Channel Master rotator combos include the rotator, controller, IR remote, mount clamps and hardware.

Channel Master CM-9521A Light Duty Antenna Rotators are perfect for rotating UHF, VHF, 6-Meter, TV, FM or magnetic loop antennas.

These rotators have a programmable rotor-controller with companion IR remote-control. Channel Master controllers remember your favorite antenna directions� even after a power outage! That means you may program in your favorite directions and rapidly return to your hottest DX path, repeaters, FM DX station or any other pre-programmed location of interest. Directional control maybe programmed by TV channel number or digital compass direction.

Control all functions with the remote control. The control console displays your chosen location or relative bearing.

{tab Features}

  • Automatic digital controller
  • Direct 3-digit compass control- in 1 degree increments(e.g. 093 degrees or 288 degrees)
  • 68 position programmable memory (for TV channels 1-69)
  • Handy Infra-Red remote control (included)
  • Use up to 280 ft. AWG 20 (3-conductor) control cable (not included)
  • Use rotator support masts from 1.25 to 2.0 in. diameter (not included)

  • Operating Temperature: -20 to 55 Degrees Celsius (-4 to 132 F)

  • Driving Torque: up to 1,000 lbs.

{tab FAQ}

Q. The rotator will only turn 300 degrees and notthe full 360 degrees. How do I change this?
The rotator cannot be changed. We looked to modify the programming to suit Australia, however this was not possible. For the majority of our customers, a 300 degree range of motion is sufficient. We have not heard of an upcoming replacement to the 9521a, though the request has been made to the Channel Master engineers in the US.

web_info_text: The TPMBKE1.8 universal mount is a product to mount an antenna on a tile roof.
ProductHTML:
The TPMBKE1.8 universal mount is a product to mountan antenna on a tile roof.

  • Suitable for tile, colour-bond, tin roofs
  • Easier and quicker to install
  • Cheaper than traditional products
  • Environmentally friendly, lead-free design!

This product is an alternative to the lead flashing product but because of the amount of lead involved in the manufacturing process, many installers are becoming very much environmentally conscious of what they use. There are also state laws that prohibit the use of lead tiles and whilst in Victoria no such legislation exits, in Queensland they are a banned product for new homes. It won’t be long before Victoria follows.

The universal mount is very simple to install and is very robust once up. It’s made from Pre-Gal steel and the stay bars used are 25mm in diameter. The mast is also 25mm with a height of 1.8m. All hardware is supplied (nuts and bolts).

We are constantly getting more and more installers who are switching over.

Download installation instructions in PDF format (206kb).

web_info_text: DVBS2-800CA VAST (Viewer Access Satellite Television) certified high definition satellite receiver brings a new level of features to the Australian VAST platform
web_info_feature#1: Designed with ease of use in mind
web_info_feature#2: Optus VAST card is already loaded in the decoder for you
web_info_feature#3: PVR ready via USB as standard
web_info_feature#4: 12/240 Volt operation for home or RV use
ProductHTML:
DVBS2-800CA VAST CERTIFIED SATELLITE RECEIVER SATKING

{tab Features}

The SatKing DVBS2-800CA VAST (Viewer Access Satellite Television) certified high definition satellite receiver brings a new level of features to the Australian VAST platform. Designed with ease of use in mind customers will find this VAST receiver a pleasure to use. From first turn on you will notice the unit is super fast to turn on and scan in channels, the Optus VAST card is already loaded in the decoder for you. A large remote control with easy to read and use buttons with built in learning function to take overbasic controls of your TV (no need for two remote controls any more). The compact design is a real winner measuring 220mm in width and very low power consumption, well below 15 watts. With PVR ready via USB as standard simply connect your external USB device to use to unit as a PVR. You will also find a fast operating and easy to read 8 day ElectronicProgram Guide (EPG).

The unit can be used for either VAST traveller customers (12 Volt) or VAST at home customers (240 Volt) via the included power pack. For self installation SatKing has developed an internal signal finder with an intensity beeper to assist with installationsthe higher the signal the faster the beeping and an electronic map built in to give you your coordinates for easier dish positioning. The unit also has a detailed electronic help guide and handy features like a USB speed test to test your USB device. For the VAST traveller caravanmarket the unit also has an optional IR target so you can place the VAST decoder in a cupboard and hide the unit out of sight also handy two place the unit behind large screen TV's in home when you don't want to look at the STB. Commercial installations and customers with older TV's will find the built in RF modulator of great assistance, you can simply use the SatKing decoder on any TV new or old without any extra expense.

web_info_feature#3: Scratch panel with unique registration code
ProductHTML:
PVR Remote control including manual and scratch card

The DSD4121 high-definition set-top box now has embedded software that can be activated to convert the unit into a Digital Recorder. An External hard disk drive ( powered via mains ) is required for this function. The USB port is used to connect this externally powered hard drive and with a newremote control the DSD4121 is able to record your favourite in digital format.

You need to purchase a remote control and a special codeis required to activate the software that is in the decoder

 

The PVR upgrade kit contains the following items

  • New Remote Control
  • New Manual
  • Scratch Panel with unique registration code

To activate the PVR functionality Visit the activation page and fill the form with unique registration code and decoder card serial number.

Once you have received your unique 16 digit activation key you will then be able to convert your DSD4121 into a Digital Recorder.

To enter the activation code you simply need to press thePVR button on your new remote control.

Once the unique 16 digit code is entered your DSD4121 isPVR Ready.

web_info_text: A richly featured Satellite Free to Air receiver which includes a fully functional USB Recorder.
web_info_feature#2: Sensitive SHARP tuner that delivers stable pictures from weaker Satellite signals
web_info_feature#3: Accepts USB Bus powered Hard Disk Drives
web_info_feature#4: Flexible Media Player plays MP3, JPEG, AVI, MKV, DivX3.11, 4.X, 6.X, FLV, H.264MP, AP@L3, RM and RMVB files
web_info_feature#5: Video outputs: HDMI, Composite and Component
ProductHTML:
{tab Features}

All the bells and whistles : Add a dish, lnb and positioner and hundreds of Freeto Air Satellite TV broadcasts can be at your finger tips. DiSEqC equipment control makes it simple.

Blind Scan : HHS242 finds what is on a new transponder or satellite, quickly. As a result, you can be viewing new channels before most people even know they exist! Scanning the whole satellite and then each transponder with its wide symbol rate range leaves little tochance. A brilliant feature - no need for a transponder list.

USB2 Recorder : Enjoy the convenience of Recording your favourite TV programs to Playback at your leisure, by connecting a USB storage device to your HHS242. You can even Pause or Rewind live TV via the integrated TimeShift function. Replay Picture and Sound Quality is perfect - absolutely as good as the initial broadcast - creating a new dimension of recording and viewing pleasure.

HHS242 accepts almost any USB storage device, even USB bus powered HDDs function flawlessly.

Better Media Player : The Media player brings a new dimension of media file playback flexibility - by playing a broad range of movie music and photo file typesincluding: MP3, JPEG, AVI, MKV, DIVX3.11, 4.X, 6.X, FLV, H.264MP, AP@L3, RM and RMVB

NTFS or FAT32 format HDD compatable : HHS242 accepts either the later and more flexible NTFS or the older FAT32 formatted drives and can reformat toeither. No longer are you forced to reformat storage devicesto the older FAT32 standard and risk losing existing data. This deceptively simple development improves the user experience whilst removing a weak point apparent in earlier systems.

High Definition Picture Quality : Experience DVD quality pictures as well as widescreen format. Brilliant picture resolution with a choice of formats including 1080i, 720p, 576p and 576i, whenbroadcast.

Multiple Video Outputs : Choice of video outputs includes HDMI, Component and Composite - making for easy installation and use with various televisions and display devices.

Robust Power Supply : To ensurelong product life, the power supply is a particularly robust design. It is also energy efficient drawing less than .8 of 1 Watt on Standby.

Small footprint : The small cabinet conceals a full featured receiver that includes a very broadrange of features.

Q: I have no sound on TV Plus 4E and RTS
A:

This issue occurred after changes were made to the audio

The PSI/SI (PCR PID) of the programs concerned is abnormal.

As such it is not considered a warranty claim.

 

However there is a firmware update for the HHS242 and can be downloaded from Google Drive by anyone with this link.

It is not a large file, less than 3mb.

As the file is executable and many devices consider such a virus, it must be unzipped before use.

Copy the file to your USB key.  Once unzipped, simply plug your USB key into the receiver and it should automatically be found.  Select Menu / System / Software Update / USB Upgrade and follow the prompts to complete.

It is vital that the receiver not be switched off during theUpgrade Process.  Progress and Completion are indicated on screen.

Check firmware version in Menu / System / Information, after update it should be 1.01.25

This should correct the issue.

{/tabs}

web_info_text: Sends the required frequencies to the satellite decoder box.
ProductHTML:
10.7GHZ TWIN KU-BAND SATELLITE LNB - STRONG

Ideal for satellite Foxtel IQ or IQ2.

To receive satellite signals, you need a LNB (Low NoiseBlock). What this does is picks up all the signals being bounced off the dish and filters out selected frequencies and amplifies the frequencies you need. It then sends the required frequencies to the satellite decoder box.

Installation using a Twin LNBF allows programming from 2 satellite locations and connection of up to 2 receivers.The Twin LNBF is the functional equivalent of 2 Single LNBFs and 2 DiSEqC switches combined into a single LNBF.

The benefit of the Twin LNBF is an installation that istypically quicker, easier and cleaner than using separate components.

web_info_text: Used to power a twin LNB. For a quad LNB, it is recommended to use 2x SN19800
ProductHTML:
This is a power supply that is used to power LNB's in small systems when an amplifier is not used to do so. Normally 2 of these units are required for 5 wire systems.

Used to power a twin LNB*. For a quad LNB, it is recommended to use 2x SN19800. For small jobs and domestic jobs, normally the satellite boxwill power the LNB. * The LNB is a Low Noise Block Downconverter or in laymans the bit of plastic in front of the satellite dish. The LNB downconverts very high frequencies to lower frequencies.

web_info_text: Single stage shock sensor is the simplest way to detect physical impact against the car
ProductHTML:
SEN-002 - SINGLE STAGE SHOCK SENSOR

 


Introduction

    Single stage shock sensor is the simplest way to detectphysical impact against the car. Once the vibration level exceeds the set value, the alarm trigger signal is sent

Operation

  • Electro-Mechanical activation
    Sensor detects any vibration exerted upon the vehicle. An intruder is detected when the vibration exceeds the set level
  • Vibration Protection
    Shock sensors will protect glass. Intruder attempting tointerfere with either items will exert vibration upon the vehicle
  • Temperature compensative circuitry
    Ensures sensitivity does not change as ambient temperature rises or falls
  • Sensitivity adjustment
    Sensor allows installer to adjust sensitivity to providecompatibility with different size vehicles

Visual Output

  • Trigger status indicator
    LED indicator shows when sensor is triggered (dual stage/zone sensors include one colour for each trigger)

Specifications

  • Super low current draw
    1.3mA when idle, 13mA when triggered for 2 seconds
  • Wide Operating voltage
    Operating voltage +9VDC to +15VDC
  • Operating temperature
    -20 degrees to +85 degrees for equipment designed to be installed within vehicle cabin
  • Polarity protection
    The system circuitry is design to protect itself againstaccidental battery polarity reversal. This can happen when replacing the vehicle battery
  • Trigger output rating
    Each output of the sensor can sink 300mA, suitable for energising relay coil when necessary
  • Trigger output is back EMF protected
    Clamping diode protects the output driver transistor(s) to stop damage from the super high voltages that occur when a relay coil is released
  • Power Consumption
    Each additional sensor added to a system will increase it's over-all power consumption from the car battery. See the list of each sensor's power consumption.

Compatibility

  • Compatible with Cyclops remote control systems
    Cyclops range of immobilisers/alarms : P355, P375, P375B, P385, P455, P485,P755, P775, P775B, P785, KE-CLR-TX90, KE-CLR-TX11, S35i, S35B, S35C, S75i, S75B, S455, S485 and S75C

Limitations

  • All vibration is assessed
    False alarms are possible if sensitivity is too high, cats jumping on bonnet or passing traffic could trigger sensor. Adjust when necessary, or else look at SEN-006, Dual zone fuzzy logic sensor.

Warranty

  • Manufacturers warranty
    Guarantees product is free from manufacturing defects for 12 months from time of purchase

Standards Compliance

  • Manufactured in ISO9001 facility
    Built within world standard production facility

web_info_text: For use with iPhone and Android phone
web_info_feature#1: Send images to your SmartPhone upon alarm event
web_info_feature#6: Email, iOS push message and SMS during alarm
ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

Yale Easy Fit SmartPhone Alarm Kit

Overview

The Easy Fit Smartphone alarm is Yale's top of the range home alarm system, operated via an iPhone or Android Smartphone, or via a standard PC web browser.

Most people are now accustomed to using their Smartphone to organise their affairs, improve their productivity and togenerally make life easier. Whether you want to find your nearest Chinese restaurant, you're having trouble sleeping, or you're unable to get up from the couch and run 5k; we're all used to hearing: "There's an app for that!"

You can now remotely arm and disarm your home's system via your Smartphone, when used in conjunction with Yale's top-of-the-range Easy Fit Smartphone Alarm, as well as receiving images captured on the wall-mounted PIR device, delivered seconds after the alarm is triggered.

Primarily alerting to intrusion via its external siren alarm, the system offers peace of mind while away from home,with the comfort of knowing you'll be alerted if anything happens.

With a range of accessories available - including the clever power switch accessory, allowing lights, appliances and other electrical items to be turned on and off using a Smartphone, this system integrates your home alarm system with your mobile device, giving you convenience and peace ofmind in your pocket.

When the alarm is triggered, the external siren will start sounding and you will be notified by email and push notification on your Smartphone. There is a wide range of accessories available for this system including the clever power switch accessory, allowing you to turn lights, appliances and other electrical items on and off using your Smartphone. {tab Features}

  • For use with iPhone and Android phone
  • Send images to your SmartPhone upon alarm event
  • Remote Arming/Disarming via app
  • Pre-linked for easy programming
  • Rolling code
  • Anti jamming
  • Email, iOS push message and SMS during alarm
  • Expandable up to 40 devices
  • Required: Home internet broadband

Rolling Code Technology Explained

When a controlling accessory (keyfob, keypad, etc) transmits a signal to the control box, it will transmit a unique code alongside the actual message. This code allows the control box to check whether this device is an authorised device; if it's not an authorised device (for example, your neighbour's keyfob), the control box will ignore the message. Problems can arise when the unique code is intercepted as, in many systems, this unique code remainsthe same for every transmission. If someone intercepted thiscode, they can possibly mimic this code and send a command to the control box illegally. The Yale Easy Fit Alarm's Rolling Code Technology prevents this by ensuring this unique code is different for every transmission. If someone intercepted this code, it would have already expired and cannot be used to control the system, adding an extra layer of security to prevent unauthorised access.

433MHz Technology Explained

The Easy Fit Alarm from Yale uses a frequency that is more tightly controlled than many used by alarm systems, meaning a clearer channel with less interference. The 433MHzfrequency has a short duty cycle of 1% as defined regulation, meaning that any one device can only transmit for 1% of the time, leaving the channel 99% of time free of transmission. This means that where there are multiple devices operating, they are less likely to collide resultingin a higher performance. Other devices that operate on a higher cycle are far more likely to collide and result in interference.

{tab Specifications}

Kits includes:

  • 1 x Control Box
    • 2 x 2.2cm screws
    • 2 x 2.5cm wall plugs
    • 1 x bracket
    • 1 x network cable
    • 1 x 12v DC power adaptor
  • 1 x Siren Box
    • 4 x 3.4cm screws�
    • 4 x 2.5cm wall plugs
      • The siren box is fitted to the front of the property, in a highly visible position. It acts as a permanent visual deterrent. If activated, the siren will sound and the LED light will flash.
  • 2 x Remote Keyfob
    • Handy addition to your alarm giving you greater flexibility. Enables you to arm, disarm, and signal a panic remotely.
  • 1 x PIR Movement Detector
    • 4 x 1.5cm screws�
    • 4 x 2.5cm wall plugs
      • Activates your alarm when someone moves around your home. Enables additional rooms/zones to be added to your kit. Also suitable for garages.
  • 1 x PIR Image Camera
    • 4 x 1.5cm screws
    • 4 x 2.5cm wall plugs
      • Ideal for securing a single room, this accessoryactivates the alarm system and captures still images when someone moves around your home. The image can be viewed using a compatible SmartPhone. You can also request an imageto be sent to your SmartPhone at any time.
  • 1 x Door/Window Contact

ProductHTML:
450-246 SERIAL LEAD 4 WAY PROGRAMMING LEAD D8XD / D16XD - NESS

Serial cable for direct connect programming of the D8XD and D16XD with a PC and Nesscomms. Connects to the "serial" header on the D8XD or D16XD and to the serial port on a laptop or PC.

web_info_text: Allows communication between Ethernet networks and serial devices
ProductHTML:
K-6002 ETHERNET TO RS232 BRIDGE (BI-DIRECTIONAL) NESS

The IP232 is an Ethernet to RS-232 Serial Port Bridge.

It may be used to connect any standard serial communications device such as a PC, an audio/video distribution system, or an Ness-M1 Control or Ness D8X / D16X, to an Ethernet network.

It allows bi-directional communication between the two.It operates as a network server, which means it does not initiate network connections, but rather, accepts them.

The IP232 is required to connect the D8X / D16X to the Ness iComms iOS App or the Ness M1 Touchscreen to the Russound Audio Distribution system.

FEATURES:

  • Supports both UDP and TCP protocols
  • Allows up to twelve (12) simultaneous TCP-IP network connections
  • Up to twelve (12) "Rules" may be programmed to make outgoing connections.
  • Outgoing connections may be initiated upon power up orwhen serial activity is detected.
  • They may remain connected indefinitely or for a set time period.
  • Selectable baud rate from 300 to 115200 baud
  • Supports software handshaking (XON/XOFF) and hardware handshaking (RTS/CTS)
  • Multiple Bridges can be used on the same network
  • Can be updated in the field with new firmware using the Configuration Utility
  • Integrated 802.3 compliant 10/100 Mbit network interface
  • RS232, DB9M 9-pin serial port connection
  • Connects to the M1 RS-232 Serial port (Port 0).
  • RJ45 8-pin Network Jack
  • 2.1mm barrel type power connector (center positive)

SPECIFICATIONS:

  • Operating Voltage: 12 Volts D.C. from ELK-P1216 Plug-in Power Supply**
  • Current Draw: approx. 135 mA
  • Dimensions: 3.85. L x 1.7. W x 0.93. D

INSTALLATION MANUAL

BROCHURE

NESS ICOMMS IPHONE SOFTWARE

ProductHTML:
{tab Overview}

106-179 SCR PLUS FLEXIBLE RECEIVER - NESS

Works with Virtually Any model Alarm System.

The Ness SCR+ Flexible Standalone Receiver is a unique high performance radio receiver designed to operate with anyNess proprietary radio transmitting device including Ness Radio Keys, Radio Key pendants, Radio Reed switches, Radio Smoke Detectors and Radio PIRs.

The SCR+ is ideal for connecting to alarm panels which donot provide a wireless facility and can be used for connecting wireless devices for zone alarms, Panic buttons or Radio Keys for Arming and Disarming the Panel. The Inhibit input gives the receiver the unique ability to identify the Armed/Disarmed status of an alarm panel.

When used with a Ness radio key it allows the receiver toalways correctly Arm or Disarm the Panel. The SCR+ is also ideally suited for applications that require a remotely switched relay output for low voltage switching applicationse.g. garage door opening.

The Relay output can be selected to be Pulsing or Latchedfor alarm signals or a Pulsing output for Panic/Tamper, Aux or Low Batt signals. The SCR+ will accept up to four individual Radio Keys and Panic Buttons or up to four alarm transmitting devices (Radio Reed Switches or PIRs)

{tab Features}

  • Receives ARM / Disarm / PANIC / AUX / Low Batt channels from Ness Radio Keys or Radio PIRs / Radio Reeds.
  • Supports up to four transmitters.
  • Simple �Learn Mode� programming for radio devices.
  • 1 x Relay output with selectable Toggle/ Pulse, selectable
  • 4 x Open Collector outputs for Panic/ Tamper, On/Alarm, Aux, Low Battery
  • Compatible with any control panel or equipment.

{/tabs}
